title: Opinion: I spent nearly 20 years on a drug for restless leg syndrome. It wrecked my life
description: After discovering a drug he took for restless leg syndrome caused compulsive gambling, J. Aaron Sanders found himself facing “existential questions of free will.”
content: After discovering a drug he took for restless leg syndrome caused compulsive gambling, J. Aaron Sanders found himself facing “existential questions of free will.”
